text: Noel Laurence Allanson (25 December 1925 â€“ 7 February 2022) was an Australian rules footballer. He played with Essendon in the Victorian Football League (VFL) between 1947 until 1951 and also played cricket for Victoria in Sheffield Shield. He was born in Carleton, Victoria. Allanson died on 7 February 2022, at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Australian cricketers Category:Australian rules footballers Category:Sportspeople from Victoria (Australia)
title: Noel Allanson
